title: The Daily Smile Game Show
description:
Dan Rubenstein, host of Wondery’s Sports Wars and The Solid Verbal, is a trivia fanatic. He’s been a television game show contestant four times. So today, Nikki surprises him with an impromptu Daily Smile game show, including some questions he couldn’t possibly answer.

Listen to Sports Wars and The Solid Verbal

Follow Dan Rubenstein

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
